scripts.electron:dev:prod: vue-cli-service build --mode=development && cross-env VUELECTRO_ENV=devprod electron electron-main.js
scripts.electron:prod: vue-cli-service build && cross-env VUELECTRO_ENV=prod electron electron-main.js
scripts.electron:build: vue-cli-service build && cross-env VUELECTRO_ENV=build electron electron-main.js
